_xResult.title: Taffeta Midi Black Skirt
_xResult.longdesc:
Make any day a special occasion in this sweetheart of a skirt. This made to measure piece is a black midi, made of the thickest of taffetas. The large folds make beautiful pleats, and the impeccable finishes (plus pockets!) differentiate it from off-the-rack retail. This skirt pairs easily with form-fitting tops or short blazers or jackets. Wear your new favorite skirt to the symphony, on a date, or just lounging around dreaming of your next movie premier! 

One design detail is the metallic golden zipper at the back that gives a modern twist and makes it easier to wear it in different styles.  

You need a skirt made custom to your measurements. You'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly!

  • Standard length  60cm unless specified otherwise
  • Golden Metallic Zipper at the back
  • Hidden side pockets
  • Color in the photo: Black
  • Polyester 100%
  •

properties.propvalue: Spot clean or dry clean only.
